alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...ISOLATED THUNDERSTORMS WITH GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER...WESTERN FALL RIVER...SOUTHERN CAMPBELL AND SOUTHERN WESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM MDT... At 628 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Savageton to 8 miles northwest of Redbird. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wright, Savageton, Thunder Basin Mine, and Rochelle around 635 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Morrisey and Clareton. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 114 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
